! source activate HardCC_SlowFast &&    conda install av -c conda-forge
! source activate HardCC_SlowFast &&    pip install -U iopath
! source activate HardCC_SlowFast &&    pip install psutil
! source activate HardCC_SlowFast &&    pip install opencv-python
! source activate HardCC_SlowFast &&    pip install torchvision
! source activate HardCC_SlowFast &&    pip install tensorboard
! source activate HardCC_SlowFast &&    pip install moviepy
! source activate HardCC_SlowFast &&    pip install scipy
! source activate HardCC_SlowFast &&    pip install pandas
! source activate HardCC_SlowFast &&    pip install sklearn
